name: Braking Brad
description:
Giant Bomb's Brad Shoemaker has only one goal: go as fast as possible without careening off the edge of a cliff! There's only one way that you can help: BY BRAKING BRAD.

Headphones recommended! If you want a different resolution, download a ZIP file and stretch the executable inside as big or as small as you want!

With special thanks to Brad Shoemaker of Giant Bomb & Samantha Kalman of Timbre Interactive (buy Sentris!).
